channel.title: Connecting from same IP adress
channel.description: Hey guys! Some I hosted a 742 server yesterday for me, my brother and some of my friends. Everything went well but then I found one problem. I can't connect to my server with my brother at the same time. It says that there are too many connections from my IP adress. I think that I can change the limit from my source files somewhere but I didn't find out how to... So if you guys can help me, I would appreciate that. Thank you! :)

item.title: Connecting from same IP adress
item.dc:creator: @Expo_man123 Expo man123
item.description:
@Expo_man123 wrote:

Hey guys! Some I hosted a 742 server yesterday for me, my brother and some of my friends. Everything went well but then I found one problem. I can’t connect to my server with my brother at the same time. It says that there are too many connections from my IP adress. I think that I can change the limit from my source files somewhere but I didn’t find out how to… So if you guys can help me, I would appreciate that. Thank you!
